ygData.subject: IEX client / status page updated
ygData.msgSnippet: Colin, There was a bug in the auto-update code, so your client is probably dead. Could you update it manually like so: rm get_latest.sh wget

Colin,

There was a bug in the auto-update code, so your client is probably dead.  
Could you update it manually like so:

rm get_latest.sh
wget http://www.hanlonsrazor.com:81/neat/iex/iex_client/get_latest.sh
./get_latest.sh
./iex_client.sh

Thanks! :)

For the rest, I spent the weekend making all kinds of nice graphs and 
visualizations, and cool stuff like that.  Check out the new, colorful 
status page:

http://www.hanlonsrazor.com:81/neat/iex/reports/

-- John
